goal.en: Understand product cost information, management planning and control information, the relevance of production management (PP) modules and management accounting modules (CO), management decision information and the impact of ERP on management accounting.
goal.ch: 了解產品成本資訊、管理規劃與控制資訊、生產管理(PP)模組與管理會計模組(CO)之關聯性、管理決策資訊及ERP對管理會計的影響。

content.en:
1. Course introduction and introduction to ERP and introduction to management accounting
2. Product cost information and journal guide
3. Management planning and control information and journal guidance
4. The relevance of the production management (PP) module and the management accounting module (CO)
5. Management decision-making information and journal guidance
6. The impact of ERP on management accounting
7. SAP Controlling module introduction
a. SAP CO Overview + basic operation
b. Cost Center Accounting
c. Profit Center Accounting
d. Internal Order
e. Product Cost Planning
f. Cost Object Controlling-Production Order
g. Profitability Analysis
content.ch:
1.課程介紹及ERP簡介及管理會計概論
2. 產品成本資訊及期刊導讀
3.管理規劃與控制資訊及期刊導讀
4.生產管理(PP)模組與管理會計模組(CO)之關聯性
5.管理決策資訊及期刊導讀
6.ERP對管理會計的影響
7. SAP Controlling module introduction
a. SAP CO Overview +基本操作
b. Cost Center Accounting
c. Profit Center Accounting
d. Internal Order
e. Product Cost Planning
f. Cost Object Controlling - Production Order
g. Profitability Analysis

textbook.en: Textbooks: 1. Self-edited SAP computer textbooks (unified photocopy). 2. Domestic and foreign academic journals-management accounting and ERP related fields.
textbook.ch: 教材：1. 自編SAP上機教材 (統一影印) 。 2. 國內外學術期刊-管理會計與ERP相關領域。

method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗

grading.en: Performance assessment: 1. Interim report homework (20%) 2. Final group report (25%) 3. Attendance and sign-in (10%) 4. SAP on-board operation (45%)
grading.ch: 成績考核：1.期中報告作業 (20%) 2. 期末分組報告 (25%) 3.出席簽到 (10%) 4.SAP上機操作(45%)
